system.availability: A Memetic Virus rarely used on Elite Skitarri. Once infected the subject falls into a deathy feaver and is confronted with pre-programmed visions of great horror and torment. Those that survive must make a -10 Willpower Test, if failed they gain 1d10+10 Insanity Points, if passed they gain the Fearless Talent but permenantly lose 1d10 Fellowship.
